description: Access real-time blockchain data with a set of 29 tools integrated with the Ordiscan API. Perform authenticated queries on Bitcoin addresses, inscriptions, transactions, collections, runes, BRC-20 tokens, and sats.

port.description: The port number for the MCP server to listen on

endpoint.description: The endpoint path for MCP requests

responseMode.description: The response mode for the server

capabilities.name: ordiscan_address_brc20_activity
capabilities.description: Get all BRC-20 token transaction activity for a Bitcoin address

capabilities.name: ordiscan_address_brc20
capabilities.description: Get all BRC-20 token balances for a Bitcoin address

capabilities.name: ordiscan_brc20_info
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific BRC-20 token

capabilities.name: ordiscan_brc20_list
capabilities.description: Get a paginated list of BRC-20 tokens

capabilities.name: ordiscan_collection_info
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific collection

capabilities.name: ordiscan_collection_inscriptions
capabilities.description: Get inscriptions in a collection

capabilities.name: ordiscan_collections_list
capabilities.description: Get a paginated list of indexed collections

capabilities.name: ordiscan_inscription_info
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific inscription

capabilities.name: ordiscan_inscription_traits
capabilities.description: Get traits for a specific inscription

capabilities.name: ordiscan_inscription_transfers
capabilities.description: Get transfer history for an inscription

capabilities.name: ordiscan_inscriptions_activity
capabilities.description: Get inscription transfer activity for an address

capabilities.name: ordiscan_inscriptions_detail
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about an inscription by number or ID

capabilities.name: ordiscan_inscriptions_list
capabilities.description: Get a paginated list of all inscriptions

capabilities.name: ordiscan_address_inscriptions
capabilities.description: Get all inscription IDs owned by a Bitcoin address

capabilities.name: ordiscan_address_rare_sats
capabilities.description: Get all rare sats owned by a Bitcoin address

capabilities.name: ordiscan_rune_market
capabilities.description: Get the latest price and market cap for a rune

capabilities.name: ordiscan_rune_name_unlock
capabilities.description: Check when a specific rune name becomes available to etch

capabilities.name: ordiscan_runes_activity
capabilities.description: Get rune transfer activity for an address

capabilities.name: ordiscan_address_runes
capabilities.description: Get all rune balances for a Bitcoin address

capabilities.name: ordiscan_runes_list
capabilities.description: Get a paginated list of all runes

capabilities.name: ordiscan_sat_info
capabilities.description: Get information about a specific satoshi

capabilities.name: ordiscan_tx_info
capabilities.description: Get information about a Bitcoin transaction

capabilities.name: ordiscan_tx_inscription_transfers

capabilities.name: ordiscan_tx_inscriptions
capabilities.description: Get all new inscriptions created in a Bitcoin transaction

capabilities.name: ordiscan_tx_runes
capabilities.description: Get a list of all minted and transferred runes in the transaction

capabilities.name: ordiscan_utxo_rare_sats
capabilities.description: Get all the rare sats for a specific UTXO

capabilities.name: ordiscan_utxo_sat_ranges
capabilities.description: Get all the sat ranges for a specific UTXO

capabilities.name: ordiscan_address_utxos
capabilities.description: Get all UTXOs owned by a Bitcoin address and their associated inscriptions and runes

capabilities.name: ordiscan_main
capabilities.description: Main Ordiscan API tool for general rune information and status
